content.content: Hello everyone, Band Protocol would like to put in an application to have BAND token accepted as one of MCD(Multi-Collateral DAI) collateral. The application is filled out and attached as a google drive link below. Should you have any questions please contact me!   docs.google.com    BAND of MCD Application Form MCD Application Form For BAND PROTOCOL  Technical Specifications What is the token contract address?  0xba11d00c5f74255f56a5e366f4f77f5a186d7f55 Where can the source code be viewed? Please provide links to the source code for all contracts providing...

Hi @ash_jl sh_il Thank you for your application. Maker is currently internally discussing how to optimize the collateral onboarding process. Accordingly there could be some time before the team has a chance to review your application.
@ash_jl My understanding is that we now have a collateral onboarding process that is ready for action, MIP6: Collateral Onboarding Form/Forum Template Can we get BAND going again?

@ash_jl There is now a new collateral onboarding form for MCD, the template for which is provided here: https://github.com/makerdao/mips/blob/master/MIP6/MIP6c2-Collateral-Application-Template.md If you are still interested in having your token onboarded to MCD, please fill out the new form and post it as detailed here: https://github.com/makerdao/mips/blob/master/MIP6/mip6.md#mip6c1-process-overview I’ll be locking this thread as I’d like to retire the older applications. Thanks!
